Pre-Game Insights: USA is making its first appearance in the T20 World Cup.
Former New Zealand all-rounder Corey Anderson adds experience to the USA squad.
Fast bowler Ali Khan, with his global franchise experience, will lead the USA bowling attack.
Canada is also making its T20 World Cup debut.
Canada's last World Cup appearance was in 2011.
The tournament opener between USA and Canada will take place on June 1.
The ICC Men's T20 World Cup is back with its ninth edition in 2024, taking place for the first time in the United States and the West Indies.
The tournament kicks off on June 1 with the co-hosts USA facing Canada at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, Texas.
This year's T20 World Cup sees 20 teams competing for the first time in its 17-year history.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The T20 Cricket World Cup will be held across nine venues in the West Indies and the United States, hosting a total of 55 games.

This tournament marks cricket's first major global event in the U.S., with 16 matches set to be played across three American venues: Central Broward Park & Broward County Stadium in Florida, Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York, and Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas.
